question: Which of the following statements regarding Lokayukta are correct?
option1: Lokayukta has no accountability to the governor
option2: He cannot ask for relevant files and documents from the state government departments
option3: Recommendations made by the lokayukta are mandatory
explanation: Lokayukta is supposed to present an annual consolidated report of his performance to the governor of the state. He is also empowered to ask for relevant files and documents from the state government departments. Finally, the recommendations made by him are only advisory.
